segments.text: I wonder if you could allow us any discount for this commodity . It's the general practice that wholesalers usually get some discount from manufacturers or suppliers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As a rule , we don't allow any discount .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we usually get a discount of 3 % to 5 % from our other suppliers . Actually , some discount on your prices would make it easier for us to promote sales , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's true . But I am sorry I can't make an exception . We have quoted you our lowest price . We can't give you any more discounts .
segments.speaker: S2
